main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering over Uzundzhovo Airfield in Bulgaria on August 21, 1957, tracked by ground radar for approximately 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported by an Assistant Turkish Army Attache with extensive experience and credible observation skills., It was described as a silver, disc-shaped metallic craft approximately 30 feet in diameter., The object exhibited unusual movements, including hovering and rapid acceleration., 20 Turkish Army officers and men observed the sighting, indicating significant witness corroboration., The conclusions drawn included possibilities of it being a balloon, aircraft, or an astronomical object due to insufficient data.
sighted object: one bright object, described as a silver, disc-shaped craft
